Reviews.Title: An great price for an excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Grant
Reviews.Content: After ordering this I had some issues with the seller, they resolved it quickly and better than what I expected. I'm glad I made this order. The camera excellent, straight out of the box, put in the battery that comes with it (and has a charger for the battery) it is good to go to start taking pictures...HOWEVER, (this is why I didn't rate it 5 stars) THIS KIT DOES NOT COME WITH A LENS, A BIG MISTAKE THAT I MADE, I HOPE YOU REALIZE THIS BEFORE YOU ORDER THIS KIT. That being said, I went a got a lens for $149 and was able to start taking pictures.So all in all this is an excellent camera even though I couldn't use it right away. But shopping around this is the best deal for your buck because I was able to to get a lens and this kit for under $2,000, which is about what you would spend if you got a kit that comes with a lens, BUT THEN AGAIN WHEN I BOUGHT THE KIT WAS LISTED FOR $1,394.99 AND I HAVE NOTICED SINCE THEN THE PRICE HAS JUMPED BIG TIME. So still shop around and choose wisely.

Reviews.Title: This is a great package!
Reviews.Author: Knife
Reviews.Content: This package is a perfect starter kit but when you are looking for lenses use a 18-55mm lense and but the poliroid adapters so you can turn it into what ever you want. poliroid are a very good product that is very capatable with some of the nikon lenses. I bought this as a Birthday gift to my fiancee and she absolutly loves it! And as for the seller they did a very good job packaging it and getting it to me when it was supposed to arrive, I am looking forward in continue to do business with them.
